com.easemob.chat
接口 EMCallStateChangeListener

public interface EMCallStateChangeListener

嵌套类摘要
static class EMCallStateChangeListener.CallError
          define call error in most of cases, the error was set in disconnected state
static class EMCallStateChangeListener.CallState
          define the call state
 
方法摘要
 void onCallStateChanged(EMCallStateChangeListener.CallState callState, EMCallStateChangeListener.CallError error)
          the client must add the call listener in the EMChatManager to get the call state in order to update UI
 

方法详细信息

onCallStateChanged

void onCallStateChanged(EMCallStateChangeListener.CallState callState,
                        EMCallStateChangeListener.CallError error)
the client must add the call listener in the EMChatManager to get the call state in order to update UI

参数：
callState -
